Articles.Content:
LOR-33B

After multiple attempts to perfect the rocket, the LOR-33B is a huge success. I have only been playing for 3 days and I have managed to develop a rocket capable of reaching 200,000+ feet, that'll orbit half the earth.

This rocket is one of my 3 successors:

*LOR-33B (Launcher, Orbiter, Remote-Piloted, Big)

*O-30B (Orbiter, Big)

*XO-17 (e[X]perimental, Orbiter)

Many details are classified about this rocket. But if I wanted to, I could fit a nuclear device onto the top of this rocket, with its capability to strike anywhere within half of the earth where the rocket is located.

It is very hard to make this rocket.

If you'd like more info about this rocket, contact me.
Keep it up! You'll be on da mun in no time!
